text: The CW Arrowverse and Riverdale all premiere new seasons in less than two weeks, and today we have new plot details and synopsis for upcoming episodes for Arrow, The Flash, Supergirl, and Riverdale. Let ’ s start with the season 7 premiere of Arrow, titled ‘ Locked Up ’ : Following Oliver ’ s ( Stephen Amell ) shocking decision to turn himself over to the FBI and reveal his identity as the Green Arrow to the public, Oliver has spent the past five months in Slabside Maximum Security Prison. Determined to keep a low profile to shorten his sentence for the sake of his family, Oliver is tested when he runs into old foes.
